398920.name: Tisnart Tiles
398920.description:
Tisnart Tiles takes you beyond the ordinary match-3 games! With 120 levels full of entertaining twists and surprises, you'll never know which direction gravity will pull the tiles—up, down, left, or right? No two boards are alike. Unique power-ups like Tile Blasters, Gravity Tiles, Tile Flips, and Gas Pods keep the gameplay fresh—what's coming next? Watch out for Mr. Skull! He’s waiting for you to slip up so he can steal your tiles. Between split boards, rotating tiles, and earthquakes, you're sure to get dizzy. Think you’ve got what it takes?

Features:

  • 120 levels filled with exciting twists and surprises

  • 9 unique power-ups like Flip Tiles, Bomb Tiles, and Gravity Tiles

  • Collect coins to use special items like the Multi Bomb or Multi Blaster

  • Use the Rotator to spin the tiles on the board

  • Gather Element Tiles to trigger a QUAKE and clear the board

Hints & Tips:

While there are tutorials to guide you, many secrets are left for you to discover on your own during gameplay!

The title screen is interactive—can you figure out all the things you can do?

There may be hidden secrets on the level select screen that reward extra coins. Can you find them?
